name: DEFENDUN
description:
- A lost peace

One day, ignored demons invaded the castle, and the knight's sincere prayer reached the Creator to prevent it.

The Creator gives the warrior the ability to unite and uses this ability to break down the incoming demons.

The players command the warriors skillfully to protect the castle from the terrifying demons!

game features

This game is a strategic defense game.
Players can basically summon a total of three types of units: Warrior, Archer, and Wizard.
These units defend the village by attacking the incoming demons.

In order to summon the unit, you need to use a resource called 'gold' which you can get by killing the devil.

When there are so many demons that the village reaches its limit, it faces an end.
In other words, the fate of this town is up to you.

combination system


It will be hard to fight all enemies with 3 types of units.
So the creator has the ability to put two units together in the hands of the player.

With this capability, the units will be constantly combined and their potential will be beyond imagination.
Use them to get rid of more demons.

God's blessing to be strong


When you meet an enemy, you meet a special demon.
They are not only physically strong but also the best elite of the devil, using special abilities.
Eliminate the Elite and you can choose a golden card that has the strength to match.
The effect of the golden card is only applied until the end of the game.

Tips

After the game, collect the diamonds you get and buy protective items at the store.
The protective effect is permanently applied.
